bgDescription: A small, compact proportioning data card, the data of which is read by the Synthesizer to gain access to Synthesis' corresponding products.
description: Used to heal 15% of a selected Resonator's Max HP, plus an extra 1,000 HP. (This effect only applies to your own Resonator(s) in Co-op Mode)
obtainDescription: Used to heal 15% of a selected Resonator's Max HP, plus an extra 1,000 HP. (This effect only applies to your own Resonator(s) in Co-op Mode)
